about.summary: Provides several metrics for assessing relative importance in linear models. These can be printed, plotted and bootstrapped. The recommended metric is lmg, which provides a decomposition of the model explained variance into non-negative contributions. There is a version of this package available that additionally provides a new and also recommended metric called pmvd. If you are a non-US user, you can download this extended version from Ulrike Groempings web site.

name: r-relaimpo
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '2.2-3' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-relaimpo
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/relaimpo_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/relaimpo/relaimpo_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 09f745fac3285c8633675687130357c279df80a1d1d069bd7fd155e8a9726e5d

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-boot
    - r-corpcor
    - r-mitools
    - r-survey
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-boot
    - r-corpcor
    - r-mitools
    - r-survey

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('relaimpo')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('relaimpo')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://prof.beuth-hochschule.de/groemping/relaimpo/, http://prof.beuth-hochschule.de/groemping/
  license: GPL-2
  summary: Provides several metrics for assessing relative importance in linear models. These
    can be printed, plotted and bootstrapped. The recommended metric is lmg, which provides
    a decomposition of the model explained variance into non-negative contributions.
    There is a version of this package available that additionally provides a new and
    also recommended metric called pmvd. If you are a non-US user, you can download
    this extended version from Ulrike Groempings web site.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: relaimpo
# Title: Relative Importance of Regressors in Linear Models
# Version: 2.2-3
# Date: 2018-03-09
# Authors@R: c(person("Ulrike", "Groemping", role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "groemping@beuth-hochschule.de"), person("Lehrkamp", "Matthias", role = "ctb"))
# Description: Provides several metrics for assessing relative importance in linear models. These can be printed, plotted and bootstrapped. The recommended metric is lmg, which provides a decomposition of the model explained variance into non-negative contributions. There is a version of this package available that additionally provides a new and also recommended metric called pmvd. If you are a non-US user, you can download this extended version from Ulrike Groempings web site.
# Depends: R(>= 2.2.1), MASS, boot, survey, mitools, graphics
# Imports: methods, corpcor
# Maintainer: Ulrike Groemping <groemping@beuth-hochschule.de>
# License: GPL-2
# LazyLoad: yes
# Encoding: latin1
# URL: http://prof.beuth-hochschule.de/groemping/relaimpo/, http://prof.beuth-hochschule.de/groemping/
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-03-09 11:11:57 UTC; Gromping
# Author: Ulrike Groemping [aut, cre], Lehrkamp Matthias [ctb]
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-03-10 16:27:32 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
